name: Stemming the Tide
description: The village of Oaken-mire has been raided by a large orc tribe and whilst most citizens managed to escape to the capital some were not so lucky. The four heroes entered just as the orc tribe had been repelled but could see numbers were still on the green skin side. Steeling themselves for combat and commanding militia they will have to fight valiantly to defend whats left of Oaken-mire.
